name: Lunar Delivery
description:
Your job is to deliver goods, supplies and other things to the lunar bases, without dying trying...

Extremely recommended to use a gamepad to play

Keyboard & mouse controls:

  • w,a,s,d to rotate the ship.
  • mouse to rotate the camera and right button to accelerate.

Gamepad controls:

  • Left stick to rotate the ship.
  • Right stick to rotate the camera.
  • R2 to speed up.
